betterquesting:10.desc:8:
Out of the many members that make up the undead of the Meatball Man, the dreaded ones seem to have the most freedom.
Unlike the rest of the undead, they seem to operate independently, and they have more sentience as opposed to the rest. They were placed on Terra to keep an eye on the happenings there, and they are based in many other locations around the universe, as the intelligence-gathering network of the Meatball Man.
Their ability to operate independently is most peculiar, given how the powers of the Meatball Man work. All of his slaves, no matter how powerful, are dirctly subject to hist will. They can fight, they can perform individual tasks, but they cannot do things as complex as spying people.
Something tells me it may be a different necromancer that handles the dread...
